text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
And so, just like that～…… 
I applied to transfer to Team <Ascella>!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Wait wait, isn't your response kinda weird～～～!? 
Hey! It's not like that! I properly thought about this you know!?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Did you really……?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Really～～～!! Pro・per・ly! I watched her race, talked about it, 
and then I wanted to run with Ku-chan-senpai!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Right, senpai♡? You even gave me a hand-made tiara, didn't you～♡?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Pandora-san……——Wait, stop stop! Um, why am I the 『Senpai』? 
I'm pretty sure we're the same age, aren't we?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Hm? Well, yeah but……it's fine! No biggie♡

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Is it though!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……seems like this conversation is going off the rails.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Oh, yeah. What's up?

Transferring teams has a big impact on the future of an Uma Musume, 
it's something that's very important. So let me confirm one more time.
choice_data_list: Can you do your best in Team <Ascella>?
Can you do your best in Team <Ascella>?

text_block_list.text:
Transferring teams has a big impact on the future of an Uma Musume, 
it's something that's very important. So let me confirm one more time.
choice_data_list: Can you do your best in Team <Ascella>?
Can you do your best in Team <Ascella>?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
I can do my best!! It'll be fine, for sure. 
That's why——Please let me join Team <Ascella>!

……Yeah, I see. I understand how you feel. 
In that case——
choice_data_list: I'm looking forward to it, Pandora
I'm looking forward to it, Pandora

text_block_list.text:
……Yeah, I see. I understand how you feel. 
In that case——
choice_data_list: I'm looking forward to it, Pandora
I'm looking forward to it, Pandora

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……!! Heck yeaaah～～～☆ Yay yay yaaayーーーーーー♡

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Then, I'm looking forward to it☆ 
Trainer!

And so, after causing a huge commotion, 
Fusaichi Pandora became the newest member of Team <Ascella>.

In the blink of an eye, several days had 
passed since the start of her training——
Hmmmmm～～～～…………

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……so you really were still here.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: You should at least turn the lights on, you know.

King……wait, it's already this late!? 
I-I didn't even realize……

King……wait, it's already this late!? 
I-I didn't even realize……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah, I figured that's what happened. 
……you were probably thinking about Pandora-san, right?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I thought so. 
……These past few days, I've just been watching but——

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: To put it bluntly, that girl is reaaaaally hard to handle!

(I'd heard about it from her previous trainer, but she certainly was 
incredibly talented. Even her teammates evaluated her very highly)

(I'd heard about it from her previous trainer, but she certainly was 
incredibly talented. Even her teammates evaluated her very highly)

(It wasn't like she was lacking motivation or slacking off…… 
Rather, she seemed to always be incredibly positive and having fun)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Huu, huu, huu……!! 
Here I gooooooーーーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Howaah!?

text_block_list.name: Single Knot Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Amazing acceleration……!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Goal♡ Howzzat!? How's my time!?

text_block_list.name: Antenna-haired Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Wah～……You cleared your target time easily～. 
And it was a pretty high level target line too, awesome～……

text_block_list.name: Single Knot Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
Pandora, that's crazy……! These past 3 days, I've been challenging 
myself to clear that time, but you crushed it in one day……!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
For real? For really real～? I really am a genius, aren't I!? 
Knew it～～～!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe～, since I've cleared my goal, I'm calling it a day! 
Good work out there～♪

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well, I suppose she's working hard. In her own way. 
……But, she doesn't seem 『Serious』

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
For most things she's encountered, it was probably 
enough to get by relying solely on her own talent…… 
So she probably never had to get serious or desperate.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But the racing world is not so forgiving that you 
would be able to continue like that. ——Her 『Oka Sho』 
results were pretty disastrous, weren't they?

Yeah. That's why, at the 『Oaks』 I want to help her get her revenge. 
……I want her to truly reach out for her dream.

Yeah. That's why, at the 『Oaks』 I want to help her get her revenge. 
……I want her to truly reach out for her dream.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Right. ……Then you'll just have to keep racking your brain. 
Just like you always do.
……iiiiii～～……nn……saaaaaaaaa……n——

Hm? ……Do you hear that? 
That voice……and that 『thumpthumpthump』……

Hm? ……Do you hear that? 
That voice……and that 『thumpthumpthump』……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……That voice, don't tell me——
KING-SAAAA-NN!
I'm soooooo sorrrrrrrrryーーー!!

The door, the wall, and everything that got sent flying! 
I'll put it all back to normal so……!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe this, as usual you don't even know your own strength…… 
This late at night, what's wrong? ——Kawakami Princess-san.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
And you……now that I get a good look, you're covered in dirt, 
aren't you? ……Were you training? Until this late?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Gya!! I-I apologize for being such a dusty Princess! But, I just 
had to——King-san, I had something I needed to tell you immediately!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
From the first moment I saw you. How you were more 
noble, and stronger than anyone, shining with the 
brilliance befitting of being called first-rate——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
How, within me, you instilled a dream that would never falter. 
To the King-san I admire! I just had to tell you as soon as possible——!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
King-san! I wasn't able to make it in time for the 
『Oka Sho』 but……I will be able to participate in the 『Oaks』

(! ……in Pandora's next race, the 『Oaks』, 
Kawakami Princess is also going to be competing……!?)

(! ……in Pandora's next race, the 『Oaks』, 
Kawakami Princess is also going to be competing……!?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
King-san. Since my debut, I've been able to make 
it here while remaining undefeated. ——My admiration 
for you is why I was able to do my best!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I won't be someone else's copy. 
Because 『Being yourself』 is fundamental to being a Princess!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
That's why, even while on a different team, using a different route! 
I'll still carry with me the nobility and strength that you taught me——

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I'll become the greaaaaaaaaatest Princess～～～!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …………I see.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Very well, just continue to run like that. 
On your own path, with your own feet.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……and she came in like a storm, but now she's 
already gone. Geez, what was all of that anyways?

Haha, it was a bit of a surprise. ……But, yeah…… 
『Admiration』 is quite the powerful motivator, isn't it?

Haha, it was a bit of a surprise. ……But, yeah…… 
『Admiration』 is quite the powerful motivator, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eh!? You want me to act as Pandora-san's mentor……!?

Yeah. Remembering back to her previous team, if someone like me 
were to directly instruct Pandora, I don't think it will work well.

Yeah. Remembering back to her previous team, if someone like me 
were to directly instruct Pandora, I don't think it will work well.

But, if it were a teammate of a similar level 
working hard along side her, like Kraft, then 
maybe Pandora would be more willing to hear them out.
choice_data_list: And more importantly, she admires you
And more importantly, she admires you

text_block_list.text:
But, if it were a teammate of a similar level 
working hard along side her, like Kraft, then 
maybe Pandora would be more willing to hear them out.
choice_data_list: And more importantly, she admires you
And more importantly, she admires you

text_block_list.text:
Of course, you should continue to work towards 
your next goal, the 『Victoria Mile』. However——

Of course, you should continue to work towards 
your next goal, the 『Victoria Mile』. However——

I think teaching someone else would be a good opportunity to 
also reflect on all the experience you've accumulated so far.

I think teaching someone else would be a good opportunity to 
also reflect on all the experience you've accumulated so far.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
And in my own way, while teaching Pandora-san, I'll be 
able to reassess everything I've learned……is it? I see……!

What do you think, Kraft? 
Of course, if you're ever unsure, I'll do my best to help you.

What do you think, Kraft? 
Of course, if you're ever unsure, I'll do my best to help you.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
……I understand. I'll give it a shot. 
No, I want to give it a shot!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But me too, you see……I've been thinking that I 
want to have a proper chat with Pandora-san.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
As Pandora-san's instructor! 
I'll do everything I can to the best of my abilities!
